RestrictedBoundsService
service in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Provides objects that can be used to handle Google Map 'center_changed' events to keep the user from moving a map outside a set of defined boundaries.

If you add the query argument allowedBounds to the app then the first time the user tries to recenter the map a partially opaque white rectangle will be added to the map showing the bounds the given map will be restricted to.

Methods

  • getRestrictor(key, bounds)

    Fetch an object that can be used to keep a user from panning a map outside of a set of defined bounds.

    E.g. 

    var restrictor = RestrictedBoundsService.getRestrictor('main_map',latLngBounds);
$scope.map.events.center_changed = restrictor.center_changned;
    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    keystring

    A unique key to identifiy the map instance the restrictor is associated with.

    boundsgoogle.maps.LatLngBounds

    The initial set of bounds to restrict movements to. Can be changed via setBounds.

    Returns
    object

    A "BoundsRestrictor" object.
